long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your ChatGPT experience with the ChatGPT Buttons Chrome Extension! Easily copy and download prompts, codes, and responses with just a click. This user-friendly extension is designed to streamline your workflow, making it simple to save and share valuable information from ChatGPT.

Features:

Copy Prompt, Code, and Responses: Quickly copy any text from ChatGPT, whether it's a prompt, code snippet, or response, with a single click.
Download Functionality: Save your interactions with ChatGPT as downloadable files for easy access and reference later.
Seamless Integration: The extension integrates smoothly with your ChatGPT interface, providing a hassle-free user experience.
Time-Saving: No more manual copying and pasting â€“ improve your productivity with the efficient copy and download buttons.
Get started with ChatGPT Buttons Chrome Extension and make your ChatGPT interactions more efficient and convenient!


Disclosure: This extension uses the Amazon affiliate program to generate revenue. By using this extension, you help support its development and maintenance.
